      • getComponent

        MediatorComponent getComponent(String chainid,
                             String componentId)
                               throws CiliaIllegalParameterException
        Retrieve a mediation component.
        Parameters:
        chainid - The chain where the component is.
        componentId - The id of the component
        Returns:
        The required component, null if it does not exist.
        Throws:
        CiliaIllegalParameterException

      • createMediator

        void createMediator(String chainId,
                  String componentType,
                  String componentID,
                  Map<String,Object> properties)
                    throws CiliaException
        Create a new mediator component
        Parameters:
        chainId - The chain where the mediator will be created.
        componentType - The mediator type.
        componentID - The id of the mediator.
        properties - The initial properties.
        Throws:
        CiliaIllegalParameterException - If the chain does not exist or if the mediator with the same ID already exist.
        CiliaException
